feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.4.8
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 2fcc0a63a04568ee60134b7d9b933608040b3fac feat: #543 Rate limits are now per action-entity instead of per action (#557) thanks @okglove
  • db28e8915bc8bf3e917f49832f434d19e5b390a9 feat: Include kubernetes-client (#559)
  • 182548e0dcb51eba96803c07df024d06dccb00d2 feat: add syntax for interpolating environment variables into config file (#548)
  • 8865331da2a1f1472cdf03c3c4d26d375e34be65 feat: enable JWT auth from a header (#547)
  • ec1f974f6709fc0cda91d87202e34983c12381dc feat: links to argument forms (#551)
  • b742bd89c4d82b4cd8a4ecd889492f86eac3a3a4 feat: support multiple user groups (#555) thanks @iamnoah

Others

  • c0b8dd71dbbaf61f1018accc256b7ac23cacf1f7 Enable manual trigger for buf
  • c5eaa35fb0477bde339e99cc702ecd4995c34eb5 Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • 7da8a5bc381fa13db1741b575eb0122d2ca9b471 buf dep update
  • 2b66414a938106c07a077466461bff18a2e04a5c build: Add missing build-snapshot job on PR
  • 27c287c2de662cf3a3ddbff67bdddb5d99a8deea build: Code format
  • bb4969c9acdb8c461ab683916cf675d29207e686 build: Fix webui codestyle job
  • aef70c0e1b255f2a3777a3b30d6a1501b7b1b317 build: Fix webui codestyle job
  • 902d4ed819d4a68c45286c9e8877204bd05f15ed build: Switch to buf2
  • 2320a56dd92593500a311bd1195a1d863bb3b486 build: Update cache path for go (#550)
  • 2bc45e9a09a5b8920951f7d761d53643aab6c83c build: cannot set cwd with buf-action
  • 24ba4fb57445e1097324157e3e18e5fcd0dbfb29 build: cyclo ignore "getexecutionscount
  • fa44e958d807edaefe72b86b51fff3e54097b5dc chore: Big dependency update (#553)
  • 88f639d29f12ef0bd0c8b383c3fd0cf24e4f6b2a chore: Cleanup executor shell passing (#556)
  • 2981fc4c1f0d437d859e6782f6d9eb0113d65232 doc: Point pull request template to contributors guide (#549)
  • 4ccfd0f99392e60b0dfddf314a1450edb7f93b0a fix: 404 in docs for "big error messages" (#558)
  • c3097e40db3b9411e9f79da1e1756c613cdc0f0e fix: reloading config after k8s configmap replacement (#552) thanks @davidqnz
  • 1164e5fae213855631e8ab3c09523c26e5424305 working directory for buf
  • fd3c6087f0ed1c9f931280ee0a5f351bea23dafe working directory for buf

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.4.8

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.4.8

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.4.14
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 775b3d3ca633747b75e82c9bddcf782896427056 feat: Smaller width buttons on mobile (#561)

Others

  • 6ad001619d7006bdd6e1abb407da1d5c2d99b641 build: feat/feature changelog prio
  • 6ffb0cedbcbcb7c21da6b990b999d3a88cf5350b chore: Remove surious dep update

Container images (from GitHub)

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.4.21
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 765c698a9bb59ca15bc23b80ba83dace1f04e420 feature: Easier loading of custom-webui icons with simplified paths (#567)
  • c19428f6b6387f111cf918e88a7e5a600c2c7dee feature: Policy support - allow hiding daignostics and logs (#569)

Others

  • eb2721c023de82cdf1b8e01bebc730aad0a5b28e chore: Cleanup argument handling (#571)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.4.21

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.4.21

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.5.26
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • c20eea29cde8460ff90dd8d6a3f713ee2af21b6c feat: win unicode flag (#590)
  • 8c073bf45fca6c6eda4e8a9feb182433277343ee feature: Intelligent version comparison #575 (#580)

Bug fixes

  • 0a7f3f32263e880ca2841957962988ce28e8b9f8 bugfix: #503 Fix possible race condition in onfileindir* (#576)

Others

  • b83b7a4c427bd3268fa61ddc216b88621bdf2bf6 build(deps-dev): bump base-x from 3.0.9 to 3.0.11 in /webui.dev (#577)
  • fcfa007ceca48888518a2ff97e47bc00478e2dc2 build: Add unit tests for regex (ref: #578)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.5.26

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.5.26

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.
